welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Felipe, Guatemala! Get ready to experience the beauty and charm of our city, known for its stunning landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Felipe has to offer."

restaurants.name: La Vaquita Marina
restaurants.description: La Vaquita Marina is a seafood restaurant located in San Felipe.

restaurants.name: Malecón
restaurants.description: Malecón is a mexican restaurant located in San Felipe.

restaurants.description: Restaurant Bajamar is a seafood restaurant located in San Felipe.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Base Aerea Del Sur Airport is used for shipping and receiving goods.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Quetzaltenango Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Coatepeque Airport is a small but modern building with all necessary amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for free.
